channel.description:

search for me acc : AiKy if you wanna follow me around
also , does anyone know how do they make the game "notice" those awards?

item.title: Quakelive
item.dc:creator: iKy
item.description:
i do , my theory is that they ware tracing animations , ex , if you have the in-air animation and the gauntlet-shoot animation ,and you frag , it counts, but there are meny other awards that do not require an special animation placement …

Read full topic

item.title: Quakelive
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
How would anyone here know the internal workings of Quakelive’s netcode? I’d guess they have some kind of streaming, abbreviated text output of all the events that happen in a multiplayer match (player X moves to point Y at T=1:30) and a search engine that parses the text for certain situations that, when they occur, are listed as achievements.
Now I’m going to check if I have the midair gauntlet achievement…

edit: yep! hahaha

Read full topic
